ARABIC: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'No one can protect me from Allah and I will never find any refuge apart from Him -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "No one can save me from God, nor can I find a place of refuge apart from Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: “None can protect me from Allah, nor can I find a refuge apart from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "No one can protect me from God, nor can I find any place of refuge but with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say, “No one will ever save me from Allah, and other than Him, I will not find any refuge.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "None can protect me from Allah's punishment, nor can I find refuge except in Him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Surely no one can protect me against Allah, nor can I find besides Him any place of refuge:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'From God shall protect me not anyone, and I shall find, apart from Him, no refuge,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Lo! none can protect me from Allah, nor can I find any refuge beside Him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "Surely no one can protect me against God, nor can I find besides Him any place of refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: 'verily none can protect me from Allah, nor can I find beside Him any refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Neither can anyone shelter me from Allah, nor can I find any refuge besides Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "No one can deliver me from Allah (If I were to disobey Him), nor should I find refuge except in Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "None can protect me from Allah's punishment (if I were to disobey Him), nor should I find refuge except in Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'None shall protect me from Allah, and other than Him, I will find no refuge,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “No one can protect me from God, and I will not find any refuge except with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:22] Say: ‘Indeed none shall protect me from God, from His chastisement, were I to disobey Him, and I shall never find besides Him, that is, other than Him, any refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to them, Muhammad: (Lo! none can protect me from Allah) from Allah's chastisement if I disobey Him, (nor can I find any refuge beside Him) nor can I find any escape or hiding place from Allah's chastisement if I disobey Him.
